EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -15, -50) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest (position -14.5, -48.5) storing mined iron ore
- Stone furnace (position -14, -47) smelting iron plates

### Iron Smelting Area at (0,0)
Multiple furnaces for smelting iron:
- Stone furnace at (0,0)
- Stone furnace at (2,0)
- Stone furnace at (4,4)
- Stone furnace at (6,4)

### Automation Science Pack Production at (24.5, 4.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Assembling machine (position 24.5, 4.5)
- Input chest (position 21.5, 4.5) with iron plates
- Output chest (position 27.5, 4.5) storing copper plates and science packs
- Two burner inserters:
  - At position (22.5, 4.5) moving items from input chest
  - At position (26.5, 4.5) moving items to output chest

### Power Generation System in Progress
Components being set up:
- Steam engine at (-5.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-2.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Pipe group at (-4.5, 19.5) to (-4.5, 22.5)
  - Pipe group at (-6.5, 21.5) to (-3.5, 21.5)
  - Pipe group at (-0.5, 23.5) to (6.5, 23.5)

### Research Area
Multiple labs set up for research, currently not powered:
- Several labs with automation science packs loaded
- Connected to electricity network (id 20045) but no power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipes in occupied spaces
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing pipes
- Remove existing pipes if they need to be replaced

### Errors with pipe placement distance
- Stay within 10 tiles of target location when placing pipes
- Move closer to target location if placement fails due to distance

### Errors with entity connections
- Ensure proper connection sequence when setting up fluid networks
- Connect pipes in correct order from source to destination

### Resource management errors
- Ensure coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices

### Power system errors
- Complete power generation setup before expecting electricity
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Set up complete electrical network with poles to distribute power
